languages.text: "Сейчас разблокируем, Ваша Светлость... ох, была бы возможность вытравить эту гниду, не заходя внутрь..." {n}Вдруг офицер бледнеет.{/n} "Ох же ж... да ведь подходы к отсеку покойный техномат того... в общем, включил какие-то системы безопасности, а потом и помер от ран... мы ж думали — этот если вылезет, так сразу и напорется..."

traits.locale_text: "Сейчас разблокируем, Ваша Светлость... ох, была бы возможность вытравить эту гниду, не заходя внутрь..."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "We'll unblock it right quick, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... If only there was a way to flush that fiend out without going in..." {n}He stops and pales even more.{/n} "Throne's mercy... I completely forgot... The late technomat, he... well, he turned on some security systems right before he bled out... We figured, if the xenos thinks about showing his face, those systems will get him..."
languages.original_text: "Сейчас разблокируем, Ваша Светлость... ох, была бы возможность вытравить эту гниду, не заходя внутрь..." {n}Вдруг офицер бледнеет.{/n} "Ох же ж... да ведь подходы к отсеку покойный техномат того... в общем, включил какие-то системы безопасности, а потом и помер от ран... мы ж думали — этот если вылезет, так сразу и напорется..."

The late technomat, he... well, he turned on some security systems right before he bled out... We figured, if the xenos thinks about showing his face, those systems will get him..."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: « Nous débloquons immédiatement l'accès, Votre Seigneurie... Si seulement il y avait un moyen de débusquer ce monstre sans se jeter dans la gueule du loup... » {n}Il s'interrompt tandis que son teint pâlit encore davantage.{/n} « Par le Trône... J'ai complètement oublié... Le technomate défunt, il... eh bien, il a activé des systèmes de sécurité, alors qu'il se vidait de son sang... Nous pensions que si le xénos sortait de son trou, ces dispositifs se chargeraient de lui... »
languages.original_text: "We'll unblock it right quick, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... If only there was a way to flush that fiend out without going in..." {n}He stops and pales even more.{/n} "Throne's mercy... I completely forgot... The late technomat, he... well, he turned on some security systems right before he bled out... We figured, if the xenos thinks about showing his face, those systems will get him..."

traits.locale_text: « Nous débloquons immédiatement l'accès, Votre Seigneurie... Si seulement il y avait un moyen de débusquer ce monstre sans se jeter dans la gueule du loup... » {n}Il s'interrompt tandis que son teint pâlit encore davantage.{/n} « Par le Trône... J'ai complètement oublié... Le technomate défunt, il... eh bien, il a activé des systèmes de sécurité, alors qu'il se vidait de son sang... Nous pensions que si le xénos sortait de son trou, ces dispositifs se chargeraient de lui... »
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: 「すぐにブロックを解除します、陛下…中に入らずに、あの悪魔をあぶり出す方法さえあれば…」{n}彼は立ち止まり、その顔はさらに青ざめる。{/n}「王座の慈悲を…すっかり忘れていました…あのテクノマット、彼は…出血多量で倒れる直前にセキュリティ・システムを起動させたのです…異種族が顔を出そうすれば、そのシステムにやられるだろうと考えて…」
languages.original_text: "We'll unblock it right quick, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... If only there was a way to flush that fiend out without going in..." {n}He stops and pales even more.{/n} "Throne's mercy... I completely forgot... The late technomat, he... well, he turned on some security systems right before he bled out... We figured, if the xenos thinks about showing his face, those systems will get him..."

traits.locale_text: 「すぐにブロックを解除します、陛下…中に入らずに、あの悪魔をあぶり出す方法さえあれば…」{n}彼は立ち止まり、その顔はさらに青ざめる。{/n}「王座の慈悲を…すっかり忘れていました…あのテクノマット、彼は…出血多量で倒れる直前にセキュリティ・システムを起動させたのです…異種族が顔を出そうすれば、そのシステムにやられるだろうと考えて…」
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: “我们会立刻打开大门，大人……如果能有什么办法，不用进到里面就能干掉那个恶魔就好了……”{n}他停了下来，脸色更加惨白。{/n}“黄金王座在上……我差点就忘了……那位不幸身亡的技工，他……他在失血而死之前，打开了安保系统……我们觉得，只要那个异形敢露面，安保系统就会把他消灭掉……”
languages.original_text: "We'll unblock it right quick, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... If only there was a way to flush that fiend out without going in..." {n}He stops and pales even more.{/n} "Throne's mercy... I completely forgot... The late technomat, he... well, he turned on some security systems right before he bled out... We figured, if the xenos thinks about showing his face, those systems will get him..."

traits.locale_text: “我们会立刻打开大门，大人……如果能有什么办法，不用进到里面就能干掉那个恶魔就好了……”{n}他停了下来，脸色更加惨白。{/n}“黄金王座在上……我差点就忘了……那位不幸身亡的技工，他……他在失血而死之前，打开了安保系统……我们觉得，只要那个异形敢露面，安保系统就会把他消灭掉……”
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Das haben wir schnell wieder freigeräumt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Wenn es nur einen Weg gäbe, das Monster herauszulocken, ohne hineinzugehen ..." {n}Er verstummt und verblasst noch mehr.{/n} "Bei der Gnade des Throns ... Das habe ich völlig vergessen ... Der verstorbene Technomat, er ... nun ja, er hat einige Sicherheitssysteme eingeschaltet, ehe er verblutet ist ... Wir dachten, wenn der Xenos sein Gesicht zeigt, erwischen diese Systeme ihn ..."
languages.original_text: "We'll unblock it right quick, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... If only there was a way to flush that fiend out without going in..." {n}He stops and pales even more.{/n} "Throne's mercy... I completely forgot... The late technomat, he... well, he turned on some security systems right before he bled out... We figured, if the xenos thinks about showing his face, those systems will get him..."

traits.locale_text: "Das haben wir schnell wieder freigeräumt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Wenn es nur einen Weg gäbe, das Monster herauszulocken, ohne hineinzugehen ..." {n}Er verstummt und verblasst noch mehr.{/n} "Bei der Gnade des Throns ... Das habe ich völlig vergessen ... Der verstorbene Technomat, er ... nun ja, er hat einige Sicherheitssysteme eingeschaltet, ehe er verblutet ist ... Wir dachten, wenn der Xenos sein Gesicht zeigt, erwischen diese Systeme ihn ..."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: «La abriremos enseguida, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Si tan solo existiese algún modo de hacer salir a ese demonio sin tener que entrar...». {n}Hace una pausa y su rostro palidece aún más.{/n} «Que el Trono me perdone, se me había olvidado del todo... El difunto tecnómata había... bueno, logró conectar algunos sistemas de seguridad justo antes de morir desangrado... Pensamos que, si al xenos se le ocurría asomar la cara, esos sistemas darían buena cuenta de él...».
languages.original_text: "We'll unblock it right quick, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... If only there was a way to flush that fiend out without going in..." {n}He stops and pales even more.{/n} "Throne's mercy... I completely forgot... The late technomat, he... well, he turned on some security systems right before he bled out... We figured, if the xenos thinks about showing his face, those systems will get him..."

traits.locale_text: «La abriremos enseguida, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Si tan solo existiese algún modo de hacer salir a ese demonio sin tener que entrar...». {n}Hace una pausa y su rostro palidece aún más.{/n} «Que el Trono me perdone, se me había olvidado del todo... El difunto tecnómata había... bueno, logró conectar algunos sistemas de seguridad justo antes de morir desangrado... Pensamos que, si al xenos se le ocurría asomar la cara, esos sistemas darían buena cuenta de él...».
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Engelleri hemen kaldırıyoruz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Keşke içeri girmeye gerek kalmadan o zebaniyi dışarı çıkarabilmenin bir yolu olsaydı." {n}Duruyor, beti benzi iyice atıyor.{/n} "Taht bana merhamet etsin, aklımdan çıkıvermiş. Ölen teknomat, kan kaybından gitmeden önce kimi güvenlik sistemlerini açmayı başarmıştı. Zeno kendini göstermeye karar verirse sistemler işini bitirir diye düşündük."
languages.original_text: "We'll unblock it right quick, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... If only there was a way to flush that fiend out without going in..." {n}He stops and pales even more.{/n} "Throne's mercy... I completely forgot... The late technomat, he... well, he turned on some security systems right before he bled out... We figured, if the xenos thinks about showing his face, those systems will get him..."

traits.locale_text: "Engelleri hemen kaldırıyoruz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Keşke onu, içeri girmeye gerek kalmadan dışarı çıkarabilmenin bir yolu olsaydı." {n}Duruyor ve daha da solgunlaşıyor.{/n} "Taht bana merhamet etsin, tamamen unutmuşum. Ölen teknomat kan kaybından gitmeden önce bazı güvenlik sistemlerini açmayı başarmıştı. Zeno kendini göstermeye karar verirse, o sistemler işini bitirir diye düşündük."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow
